thread.title: Pete and Sylvia doing baton change
thread.title_full: Pete and Sylvia doing baton change | DailyTelegraph

author: dailytelegraph.com
title: Pete and Sylvia doing baton change
text:
PETE Stefanovic has picked up a matching job to his girlfriend Sylvia Jeffreys , landing a permanent newsreader role on Weekend Today.
Stefanovic, brother of Today host Karl , is filling in for Wendy Kingston while she is on maternity leave and anticipates he will be warming her seat for between four and six months.
The 32-year-old has been dating Jeffreys, who reads the news on the weekday edition of the breakfast show, since December 2013.
“I pretty much take the baton from her on Fridays and pass the baton back to her at the end of the weekend,” he said of his new gig.
Stefanovic returned home in February this year after an eight-year stint overseas as Nine’s Europe, Africa and Middle East correspondent. While he misses being live at the scene of breaking international news, he’s looking forward to a different sort of thrill and some great banter on the Weekend Today set.
But that doesn’t mean he has aspirations to one day work alongside Karl on the weekday edition. “I don’t know about that,” he said of sharing the desk with Karl. He starts the new role this weekend.
